Name: Chicken with Chainguns
About the game: This chicken isn't a yellow bellied chicken. Don't get mad, get even in this silly but fun 2d shooter where the right man for the job is a chicken. - Full Support for Game Controller - Vibration rumble support for controller as well! - Atmospheric sound track - Silly Environment - Affordable price - 'Rage Chicken' Power-up - It is a Chicken with Chainguns! What more do you want?!?
